faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our SaaS template

pricing.question: How does the pricing work?
pricing.answer: Our template is a one-time purchase with lifetime access. You pay once and get all future updates for free. No monthly subscriptions or hidden fees.

features.question: What's included in the template?
features.answer: You get complete source code, authentication system, payment integration, database setup, UI components, documentation, and deployment guides. Everything you need to build a modern SaaS application.

support.question: What kind of support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide email support for all customers, priority support for Pro users, and 1-on-1 calls for Enterprise customers. We also have an active community Discord server.

integration.question: Can I integrate with my existing tools?
integration.answer: Yes! The template is built with modern, standard technologies that integrate well with most tools. We provide guides for popular services like Analytics, CRM, and monitoring tools.

customization.question: How customizable is the template?
customization.answer: Extremely customizable! The code is clean, well-documented, and modular. You can modify anything from colors and fonts to complete functionality. We also offer custom development services.

deployment.question: How do I deploy my application?
deployment.answer: We provide detailed deployment guides for Vercel, Netlify, AWS, DigitalOcean, and other platforms. Most deployments can be done with just a few clicks.

updates.question: Do I get updates?
updates.answer: Yes! All customers get lifetime updates including new features, security patches, and compatibility updates. Updates are delivered through our customer portal.

refund.question: What's your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the template for any reason, contact us within 30 days for a full refund.

testimonials.title: What Developers Are Saying
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who have built successful products with our template

items.name: Sarah Chen
items.content: This template saved us 6 months of development time. We went from idea to paying customers in just 3 weeks. The code quality is exceptional.

items.name: David Rodriguez
items.content: Best investment we made. The authentication and payment systems work flawlessly. Our team could focus on building our core features instead of boilerplate.

items.name: Emily Johnson
items.content: As a solo developer, this template gave me superpowers. I built and launched my SaaS in 2 weeks instead of 2 months. The documentation is incredible.

items.name: Michael Zhang
items.content: The architecture is solid and scalable. We've grown from 0 to 10,000 users without any major issues. The template handles everything beautifully.

items.name: Lisa Williams
items.content: The code quality exceeded our expectations. Clean, well-documented, and follows industry best practices. Our whole team was productive from day one.

items.name: Alex Thompson
items.content: This template is a game-changer for indie hackers. Everything just works out of the box. I've built 3 successful SaaS products using it.
